review: Dr Pallavi, besides being a warm friendly person, is professionally very sound. She comes in to deal with the crucial problem, and ensures you are comfortable and satisfied, after the treatment. Dr Pallavi has a very efficient team, and she coordinates beautifully. One can be rest assured, one will return extremely satisfied, after a brilliant job done.

review: I was quite satisfied the way the  plan for my dental treatment was explained. She spent adequate time answering all my queries patiently . Dr Pallivi ,Dr Dhawani & her team were simply great. Thier set up is highly recommended for your dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I, Smita Shivalkar went through surgery performed by Dr. Vipin Mahurkar, Periodontice. He performed the surgery of implants in place of missing teeth.  The procedure was totally painless thanks to good anaesthesia. The process of implants settling and gum healing went very smoothly, without any complications, which was confirmed by Dr. Vipin Mahurkar with a couple of follow-up appointments. During the most recent appointment, after the surgery, I was happy to hear from Dr Vipin Mahurkar that my implants are ready for the last stage-putting the makeup teeth with crowns and this procedure was done by Dr Pallavi Mahurkar, (cosmatic Dentistry & smile designing specialist).  Dr Pallavi and Dr Dhwani Kapadia were working patiently on me to give me replacement of missing teeth as well as my smile. Overall Iâ€™m very happy with the work that Dr. vipin Mahurkar & Dr Pallavi Mahurkar and their entire team has done for me. I have been feeling great and more confident ever since the surgery. I couldnâ€™t have done it without Dr Vipin & Dr Pallavi's special skillset and support, so thank you!  I will highly recommend Dr Vipin Mahurkar  & Dr Pallavi Mahurkar to everyone who is afraid of visiting Dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
On the very first I was very much impressed with the implants explanation given Dr. Vipin and Dr. Pallavi.
I immediately decided to go for implants at Synergy Clinics because the Clinics has many rooms with additional 2 more are working here. 
The madam Dr. Pallavi explained about the implants plan along with the fee structure .
We have accepted the plan and within 3 days my implants with the removal of 8 teeth  and 6 implants on one single day.
After 3 rd day I have received my teeth back. I am very happy and thankful to Dr. Vipin Dr. Pallavi,Dr. Dhvani , Nishant , Damiani, Ms. Nisha and Ms. Sonali along with other staff members 

Thanks 

Hilary Mathos 
Str. Engineer 
Vasai .

review: My name is Pooja shetty .had visited the doctor for root canal .it was just done in just one sitting.it was my first visit to the clinic .really happy impressed and satisfied the way the procedure was done from start till end .the staff is very polite humble and friendly.all safety protocols were followed .they use high tech technology at the clinic.very happy with the service .dr  Pallavi and dr vipul are highly professional and experienced doctors.very  .I m glad I m in safe hands .would surely recommend to my family and friends.I had a very good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was my 1st ever medical treatment. In my life so far have never visited any Dr for more than cold-cough or viral infections.So was very nervous but Dr Pallavi had been calm to explain everything and highlighted the intensity of the issue on the stage at which I visited and had to undergo the treatment, as also I was under pain.she made me feel at ease..and treatment went well also her assistant Dr Saloni was supportive and patient enough with my concerns.Thanks Practo and Synergy Center. Would surely recommend it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,

She made me really feel comfortable and everyone around her too kept me comfortable and very warm hearted . Great experience and would definitely recommend her to my other Family and Friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi, 

Synergy Dental at Borivali is an excellent one stop solution for all your dental problems and smile correction. They have a very good set up and proficient team lead by Dr. Pallavi Kendrekar and Dr. Vinay Mahurkar. All staff are cordial and caring including Dr. Sonyabai, Nurse Damini etc but the one Dr who is impressive and make you most comfortable is Dr Dhwani Kapadia.. *** ** *** **** ** *** ***. Keep up the good work Synergy.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,

Excellent treatment & care, expert doctors, polite staff, well equipped clinic.

Deepa Teksingh Pujara
